summary: Long Island is a big island off the southeast coast of New York State. It's home to over 8 million people, making it the most populous island in the U.S. It's divided into four counties: Brooklyn, Queens, Nassau, and Suffolk. The island has a diverse population and is known for its wealthy neighborhoods and working-class areas. It's an important place for aviation with two big airports, JFK and LaGuardia. Long Island also has many science and research centers, contributing to its strong economy.
title: Long Island
